message.content:
To find the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, we need to look at the depreciation line item in the cash flow statement.

In this case, the relevant line item is labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 115511.91, dated 2024-02-02. This represents the depreciation expense recognized during the period, which is the systematic allocation of the assetâ€™s depreciable amount over its useful life.

Therefore, the value of the systematic allocation (depreciation expense) for the period is 115511.91.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "115511.91"}}
```
